name: Monster Country #1: Setting Out!
description:
When the wimpy Desmond crashes into the wild jungles of Monster Country he thinks he's a goner until he meets the ultra-powerful half-beast Drill and her monkey pal Chip-Chip!

The duo agrees to help Desmond find his way home, but what sort of dangers lie along the way..?

It's the return of Monster Country, now in full color with remastered artwork!

(28 pages, Full Color)
